name: Heroin - Kurt Cobain
description:
Here is the story of Kurt Cobain, your name is Kimberly, and you are his sister, you need to help your brother.

Voice acting is present in both Russian and English versions of the game.

Developer: The Forge of the Games
Publisher: The Forge of the Games

Control:
Walking - W,A,S,D
Running - Left Shift
Use - E
LMB - Attack
Crouch - Ctrl
